thread.title: BRIEF-Guangdong Wens Foodstuff Sees Q1 Net Profit Down, Plans Bonds, Commercial Paper and Notes Issues

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Guangdong Wens Foodstuff Sees Q1 Net Profit Down, Plans Bonds, Commercial Paper and Notes Issues

organizations.name: guangdong wens foodstuff group co ltd

text:
April 9 (Reuters) - Guangdong Wens Foodstuff Group Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT SEES Q1 NET PROFIT DOWN 3.61-8.36 PERCENT Y/Y FROM 1.47 BILLION YUAN ($232.98 million) A YEAR AGO
* SAYS IT PLANS TO ISSUE BONDS WORTH UP TO 5 BILLION YUAN * SAYS IT PLANS TO ISSUE UP TO 3 BLN YUAN COMMERCIAL PAPER, UP TO 3 BLN YUAN MEDIUM-TERM NOTES Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2IErXbg ; bit.ly/2qj7eT7 ; bit.ly/2GPXl6s Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3095 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
